Zacks Equity Research Analyst Blog Cancel Read More Hide Full Article In a bid to expand its product portfolio, Expeditors International of Washington, Inc. ( EXPD - Free Report ) completed the acquisition of Fleet Logistics' Digital Platform. The buyout is expected to boost Expeditors' online LTL shipping platform, Koho. The move is in line with the company's focus on Digital Solutions. Apart from supporting Koho, the investment is also expected to brace small shippers quote, book, manage and track the LTL shipments online. Amid the coronavirus crisis, the acquisition is ...
